name: GachaPon!
storyline: In GachaPon!, your mission is to drop colorful capsules into the case and fuse them together, all in pursuit of creating the legendary Rainbow Gacha. But there's more to this game than meets the eye! With a treasure trove of over thirty enchanting keychains, each one offering a unique twist to your gameplay, GachaPon! lets you customize your experience with endless possibilities.
summary: Embark on a whimsical journey of physics-based puzzle-solving in the delightful world of GachaPon! Discover the art of relaxation as you immerse yourself in this charming game, where the goal is not just to solve puzzles, but to enjoy the process of being yourself.
